content.title: A Heat Shield for the Most Important Ice on Earth
content.alternative_title: Rachel Riederer writes about geoengineering and the idea of using glass bubbles to deflect light away from Arctic ice to slow climate change.
content.description: Engineers might be able to protect Arctic ice by coating it with tiny glass bubbles. Should they?
